mdRecord.dcterms:title: Herschel photo; 01 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--PhotographsItems 37-42Photo of Sir William Herschel at age 80, on a 4x7 cardboard plaque, handwriting on back, crossed-out: "Return to Miss W. Hardcastle, Hawkhurst", not-crossed: "an amateur photograph, time-exposure, taken out of doors." Found together with photograph items 074-037 through 074-042.; 1 item; DF 773
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Herschel, William, Sir, 17381822
